revision.comment: Added second editor number 5006 and removed all text about defining that with custom data
revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Skybox compatibility camera | class = SkyCamCompat | doomednum = 9083/5006 }}[[Classes]]: {{Class|Actor}}→{{Class|SkyViewpoint}}→SkyCamCompat
This camera allows the creation of skyboxes in a method similar to that of the [[Eternity Engine]]. The skyboxes in the map will then work correctly in [[ZDoom]]. (No guarantee given for any other Eternity feature, including effects that may be used in the skybox sectors.) ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SkyCamCompat : {{Class|SkyViewpoint}} native {}
